verses.roman:
cūrṇa haila, hena vāsoṅ nimāñi-kalevara
hā-hā kari' viṣṇu-pāśe māge ei vara

synonyms: cūrṇa—smashed; haila—has become; hena—thus; vāsoṅ—I think; nimāñi-kalevara—the body of Nimāi; hā-hā kari'-crying loudly; viṣṇu-pāśe—Lord Viṣṇu; māge—begs; ei—this; vara—benediction.
translation: Śrīmatī Śacīmātā thought that the body of Nimāi was being smashed when He fell down so. She cried, "Alas!" and petitioned Lord Viṣṇu.
